titles.title: Returning to the Senate the bill S. 1109.

action.text: QUESTION OF PRIVILEGE - Mr. Crane rose to a question of the privileges of the House and called up H. Res. 645. The Chair stated that the resolution met the threshold for a question of privlege and the House proceeded with one hour of debate on the resolution.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/24/2000--Introduced. Returns to the Senate S. 1109 (bear protection) because, in the opinion of the House of Representatives, it contravenes the Constitution and infringes upon the privileges of the House.
